articles.content:
International Marathon Race for Mangyongdae Cup to be held 
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The 16th International Marathon Race for Mangyongdae Cup will be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The race will bring together ace male and female marathoners from over 10 countries including the DPRK.    
 The organizing committee was formed and preparations for the event are brisk and posters of the race have been produced.

DPRK-China plan for cultural exchange signed
articles.content:
DPRK-China plan for cultural exchange signed 
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A plan for cultural exchange for 2003-2005 between the governments of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the People's Republic of China was signed with due ceremony in Beijing on Monday.
 The plan was signed by Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is head of the DPRK government cultural delegation, and Zhao Weishu, Chinese vice-minister of culture, at the ceremony.

Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Palestinian Yasser Arafat on the occasion of the tenth anniversary of his election as Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 Today it was conveyed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador  to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah.
